headline: Is Corpay, Inc. (CPAY) One of the Cheap Technology Stocks to Invest In According to Hedge Funds?
summary: Corpay, Inc. (NYSE:CPAY) is one of the 12 Cheap Technology Stocks to Invest In According to Hedge Funds. On February 11, Corpay, Inc. (NYSE:CPAY) announced that its Cross-Border business has signed a multi-year agreement with LIV Golf, extending its successful and exclusive partnership as LIV’s official corporate foreign exchange (FX) provider.
